Sections.SectionText: With my assistance, Zarcon applied for and easily received recognition as sentient life.
Zarcon also acquired sovereignty of the planets rather quickly.
Holding the entire Terracom robot fleet hostage helped fast-track the application.
Now I'm enjoying my holiday vacation exploring these planets.
These hot springs are a lot more enjoyable when Zarcon doesn't let make them shrink.
I'm thinking of starting a resort when things settle down.
I know just what to name the resort too.
